sources.title: Against All Hope (1982)
sources.description: Biography - Driven to the edge of suicide by alcoholism, and in danger of losing his family, a desperate man is recued by a priest who reaches out to hear his story. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/against-all-hope-1982/

sources.title: Against All Hope (1982) Michael Madsen | Biography, Drama
sources.description:
A man struggling with alcoholism turns to a reverend for help.

Director: Edward T. McDougal
Writers:  Edward T. McDougal, Cecil Moe, Jean Moe, 
Stars:  Michael Madsen, Maureen McCarthy, Cecil Moe
Genres: Classics, Biography, Drama
